name: NHS England Low Priority Treatment Consultation - Bath and Shower emollients
title: Bath and Shower emollients cost per 1000 patients
description: Bath and Shower emollients per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: found that there was no evidence
of clinical benefit for using bath and shower emollients in the standard management of childhood eczema.
‘Leave-on’ emollient moisturisers can still be used for treating eczema and these emollients can still be used as soap substitutes.
numerator_where:
(bnf_code LIKE '130201100%' OR        --Emollient Bath & Shower Preparation 
bnf_code LIKE '1302011L0%' OR         --Light Liquid Paraffin 
bnf_code = '21220000128' OR           --Hydromol Bath & Shower Emollient 350ml (App) 
bnf_code = '21220000129' OR           --Hydromol Bath & Shower Emollient 500ml (App) 
bnf_code = '21220000130' OR           --Hydromol Bath & Shower Emollient 1L (App) 
bnf_code = '21220000209' OR           --QV Bath Oil 
bnf_code = '21220000217' OR           --Zeroneum Bath Add 
bnf_code = '21220000227' OR           --Zerolatum Bath Add 
bnf_code = '21220000229')             --LPL 63.4 Bath Add and Emollient 
AND (bnf_code NOT LIKE '130201100%AJ' --Soya Oil_Liq 83.35% (brands and generics) 
AND bnf_code NOT LIKE '130201100%AM') -- Aq_Crm (brands and generics))
